title: I'm hyped about these AMD Zen 5 benchmark leaks — and you should be too
description: A new report claims that a dual AMD Zen 5 chip setup was able to hit 128K in Cinebench R23, which is a sizable jump from Zen 4.

title: Most businesses give in to ransomware attacks and pay out
description: A significant lack of security is putting firms at major risk, so feel they have no choice but to bite the bullet.

title: HBO Max's big Max makeover comes with one huge downgrade
description: Warner Media's Max service will, after a grace period, only offer 4K content to Max Ultimate subscribers.

title: Your own customers might be your biggest source of fraud
description: The rising costs of living makes honest people turn to scams, fraud prevention experts claim.

title: The first Wi-Fi lossless headphones are here and they're exactly what Sonos didn't do
description: A little-known Swiss audio firm just beat Apple, Bose, Sony, and Sonos in the race to deliver 'Full-Fidelity' wireless audio.

title: Microsoft gives Windows 11 a bold new look – but you might not like it

description: Most internet fraudsters share a few common traits, and Amazon laid them out.
